VossDecision_OM_Laezel_COM.synopsis: The player must pick between siding with Voss and helping Orpheus or siding with Vlaakith's Inquisitor in killing Orpheus. Laezel is predisposed to a certain faction depending on the outcome of the Creche, but can be convinced by the player to swing to the other faction. A fight results with the opposing party and Laezel can leave the party and be hostile if not convinced to side with the Player's decision.
VossDecision_OM_Laezel_COM.how_to_trigger: Go to bed in the Intermezzo Camp when you arrive. Plays automatically after the VossAmbush scene if Laezel is a Companion, either in the party, or left in camp.|

VossDecision_OM_Laezel_AOM.synopsis: Avatar Laezel must pick between siding with Voss and helping Orpheus or siding with Vlaakith's Inquisitor in helping them kill Orpheus. They both lead to a fight with the opposing party.
VossDecision_OM_Laezel_AOM.how_to_trigger: Go to sleep at the INT camp. Plays automatically after the Voss Ambush scene if Laezel is avatar.

VossDecision_OM_Laezel_COM_24.speaker: Lae'zel
VossDecision_OM_Laezel_COM_24.text: Supreme Kith'rak. Have you come to slay me with your own silver?

VossDecision_OM_Laezel_COM_151.speaker: Kith'rak Voss
VossDecision_OM_Laezel_COM_151.text: I've not come to kill you, Lae'zel. I've come to free you.

VossDecision_OM_Laezel_COM_129.speaker: Kith'rak Voss
VossDecision_OM_Laezel_COM_129.text: I've not come to kill you, child. I've come to free you.

VossDecision_OM_Laezel_COM_72.speaker: Lae'zel
VossDecision_OM_Laezel_COM_72.text: Tl'a'vlaakith - I will not be bound my flame, rider!

VossDecision_OM_Laezel_COM_6.speaker: Kith'rak Voss
VossDecision_OM_Laezel_COM_6.text: Such informality, child. Does Jhe'stil Kith'rak not command your respect?
VossDecision_OM_Laezel_COM_6.context: NodeContext: zhe-STILL KITH-rack. Supreme Knight. Fatherly, but not antagonsistically like before.

VossDecision_OM_Laezel_COM_121.speaker: Lae'zel
VossDecision_OM_Laezel_COM_121.text: Your flame speaks for you, kith'rak. You've come for blood.

VossDecision_OM_Laezel_COM_114.speaker: Kith'rak Voss
VossDecision_OM_Laezel_COM_114.text: Your blood? No, child. I've come for your aid.

VossDecision_OM_Laezel_COM_100.context: CinematicNodeContext: Voss kneels and lays his sword on the ground in the githyanki sign of submission.

VossDecision_OM_Laezel_COM_132.speaker: Kith'rak Voss
VossDecision_OM_Laezel_COM_132.text: Ska'kek kir Gith shabell'eth. My blade rests. Mother Gith compels you to listen.

VossDecision_OM_Laezel_COM_141.speaker: Player
VossDecision_OM_Laezel_COM_141.text: You've trapped us in flame. Why in the Hells should I listen to you?

VossDecision_OM_Laezel_COM_59.speaker: Player
VossDecision_OM_Laezel_COM_59.text: Your cronies tried to kill us. Why should Lae'zel listen to you?

VossDecision_OM_Laezel_COM_138.speaker: Kith'rak Voss
VossDecision_OM_Laezel_COM_138.text: Because I know the truth of your relic. It holds the very heart and soul of our people.

VossDecision_OM_Laezel_COM_112.speaker: Player
VossDecision_OM_Laezel_COM_112.text: You might have killed us before. Why should Lae'zel listen to you?

VossDecision_OM_Laezel_COM_81.speaker: Player
VossDecision_OM_Laezel_COM_81.text: Fine. We'll hear what you have to say before we gut you.

VossDecision_OM_Laezel_COM_140.speaker: Kith'rak Voss
VossDecision_OM_Laezel_COM_140.text: Your ear is all I ask. But I will take your head if I must.

VossDecision_OM_Laezel_COM_116.speaker: Player
VossDecision_OM_Laezel_COM_116.text: Nod to Lae'zel. She should take the lead.

VossDecision_OM_Laezel_COM_149.speaker: Kith'rak Voss
VossDecision_OM_Laezel_COM_149.text: I know of the relic you carry, child - and I know its truth. It holds the very heart and soul of our people.

VossDecision_OM_Laezel_COM_63.speaker: Kith'rak Voss
VossDecision_OM_Laezel_COM_63.text: The relic you carry, the one Vlaakith hunts. I know its truth. The heart of my people beats within it.

VossDecision_OM_Laezel_COM_74.speaker: Lae'zel
VossDecision_OM_Laezel_COM_74.text: Orpheus. Impossible. The traitor is dead.

VossDecision_OM_Laezel_COM_142.speaker: Kith'rak Voss
VossDecision_OM_Laezel_COM_142.text: Prince Orpheus lives. And it is his prison you carry.

VossDecision_OM_Laezel_COM_91.speaker: Narrator
VossDecision_OM_Laezel_COM_91.text: *Orpheus, a name of legend. The son of Gith, the first leader of your people, executed by exalted Queen Vlaakith - or so you were taught.*

VossDecision_OM_Laezel_COM_98.speaker: Player
VossDecision_OM_Laezel_COM_98.text: I've been inside. There was no githyanki prince there.

VossDecision_OM_Laezel_COM_15.speaker: Kith'rak Voss
VossDecision_OM_Laezel_COM_15.text: Then you've been blinded to Orpheus' light.

VossDecision_OM_Laezel_COM_19.speaker: Kith'rak Voss
VossDecision_OM_Laezel_COM_19.text: Child. You are a slave. Chained, bound, and beaten by the Queen of Lies.

VossDecision_OM_Laezel_COM_20.speaker: Kith'rak Voss
VossDecision_OM_Laezel_COM_20.text: Vlaakith does not love you. There is no ascension, no purification. You are cattle, you are chaff - to be harvested and devoured.

VossDecision_OM_Laezel_COM_57.speaker: Kith'rak Voss
VossDecision_OM_Laezel_COM_57.text: Mother Gith did not tear off our shackles for our flesh to feed a new master!

VossDecision_OM_Laezel_COM_12.speaker: Kith'rak Voss
VossDecision_OM_Laezel_COM_12.text: But her son lives, child. He lives! The flame of our freedom, burning in your hand. Together -

VossDecision_OM_Laezel_COM_31.context: CinematicNodeContext: A portal opens and a few Githyanki, including Vlaakith's Hand, name of Fahra, exit out of it and move to surround the party.

VossDecision_OM_Laezel_COM_34.context: CinematicNodeContext: Voss grabs his sword and rises to his feet

VossDecision_OM_Laezel_COM_126.speaker: a4df3a1d-0c32-4548-acfe-5e45b1886671
VossDecision_OM_Laezel_COM_126.text: Voss. My Queen serves you feast and favour - and you repay her with treason.

VossDecision_OM_Laezel_COM_125.speaker: a4df3a1d-0c32-4548-acfe-5e45b1886671
VossDecision_OM_Laezel_COM_125.text: Do not dare speak my name!

VossDecision_OM_Laezel_COM_14.speaker: Narrator
VossDecision_OM_Laezel_COM_14.text: *You recall this name: 'Fahra'. No mere warrior or even kith'rak, but Vlaakith's Hand - enforcer of your Queen's will.*

VossDecision_OM_Laezel_COM_92.speaker: Shadowheart
VossDecision_OM_Laezel_COM_92.text: |A githyanki prince? Is this why the mother superior seeks this relic?|

VossDecision_OM_Laezel_COM_38.speaker: Player
VossDecision_OM_Laezel_COM_38.text: Who in the hells are you?

VossDecision_OM_Laezel_COM_16.speaker: a4df3a1d-0c32-4548-acfe-5e45b1886671
VossDecision_OM_Laezel_COM_16.context: NodeContext: Addressed to Voss. Almost frothing.

VossDecision_OM_Laezel_COM_51.speaker: Lae'zel
VossDecision_OM_Laezel_COM_51.text: 'Fahra'. Vlaakith's Hand, her Eyes, her Voice.

VossDecision_OM_Laezel_COM_3.speaker: a4df3a1d-0c32-4548-acfe-5e45b1886671
VossDecision_OM_Laezel_COM_3.text: And more. I am Vlaakith's eyes in darkness, her ears in chaos. I am law. I am judgement!
VossDecision_OM_Laezel_COM_3.context: NodeContext: Addressed to player, increasingly deranged.

VossDecision_OM_Laezel_COM_84.speaker: a4df3a1d-0c32-4548-acfe-5e45b1886671
VossDecision_OM_Laezel_COM_84.text: Lae'zel. The pride of Crèche K'liir.
VossDecision_OM_Laezel_COM_84.context: NodeContext: Addressed to Lae'zel, suddenly calm.

VossDecision_OM_Laezel_COM_136.speaker: a4df3a1d-0c32-4548-acfe-5e45b1886671
VossDecision_OM_Laezel_COM_136.text: I know you. Your Queen knows you. You are ice, you are brimstone, stained with your kin's blood.

VossDecision_OM_Laezel_COM_45.speaker: a4df3a1d-0c32-4548-acfe-5e45b1886671
VossDecision_OM_Laezel_COM_45.text: And yet Vlaakith prepares you a place at her table.

VossDecision_OM_Laezel_COM_87.speaker: a4df3a1d-0c32-4548-acfe-5e45b1886671
VossDecision_OM_Laezel_COM_87.text: Her word is your duty, her will is your honour. Strike down the kith'rak, deliver the relic - and claim your seat at our Queen's side. Be ascended!

VossDecision_OM_Laezel_COM_118.speaker: Narrator
VossDecision_OM_Laezel_COM_118.text: *Lae'zel's loyalty to Vlaakith burns her mind - and yours. She means to strike Kith'rak Voss.*
VossDecision_OM_Laezel_COM_118.context: CinematicNodeContext: Mind meld between Lae'zel and player, but no need to show anyone's hands go to their heads, just the VFX is fine.

VossDecision_OM_Laezel_COM_33.speaker: Player
VossDecision_OM_Laezel_COM_33.text: Abandon Vlaakith, Lae'zel. Cut Fahra down.

VossDecision_OM_Laezel_COM_41.speaker: Lae'zel
VossDecision_OM_Laezel_COM_41.text: No. I will not turn on my Queen!
VossDecision_OM_Laezel_COM_41.context: NodeContext: Addressed to player, but uncertain despite her words.

VossDecision_OM_Laezel_COM_106.speaker: Player
VossDecision_OM_Laezel_COM_106.text: I heard truth in the kith'rak's words. I trust him, and so should you.

VossDecision_OM_Laezel_COM_55.speaker: Player
VossDecision_OM_Laezel_COM_55.text: You mean nothing to Vlaakith. Reject her, and seek the truth.

VossDecision_OM_Laezel_COM_130.speaker: Lae'zel
VossDecision_OM_Laezel_COM_130.text: Truth. So tainted by death and deceit that I'd forgotten its taste.
VossDecision_OM_Laezel_COM_130.context: NodeContext: Addressed to player, but more a musing to herself. She has come to see the player's point of view.

VossDecision_OM_Laezel_COM_146.speaker: Lae'zel
VossDecision_OM_Laezel_COM_146.text: 'Live, but only if you live free' - Gith's plea to us all. I will know my prince. This is my path.

VossDecision_OM_Laezel_COM_61.speaker: a4df3a1d-0c32-4548-acfe-5e45b1886671
VossDecision_OM_Laezel_COM_61.text: K'chakhi! I name you hshar'lak - traitor to your people. It is written!
VossDecision_OM_Laezel_COM_61.context: NodeContext: ke-CHOCK-ee / h-SHAR-lack (Idiot/Traitor) Addressed to Lae'zel

VossDecision_OM_Laezel_COM_13.context: CinematicNodeContext: Fahra lunges towards Voss and tries to attack, but she misses.

VossDecision_OM_Laezel_COM_111.speaker: a4df3a1d-0c32-4548-acfe-5e45b1886671
VossDecision_OM_Laezel_COM_111.context: CinematicNodeContext: Fahra weaves a psionic spell and casts it on Voss's dragon, making it fight for her.NodeContext: cue-DAY-nos CHEER-key. Che-MAR ZAL-la VLAH-kith!

VossDecision_OM_Laezel_COM_143.context: CinematicNodeContext: The dragon rears up and roars at the party.

VossDecision_OM_Laezel_COM_29.speaker: a4df3a1d-0c32-4548-acfe-5e45b1886671
VossDecision_OM_Laezel_COM_29.context: CinematicNodeContext: Prepares to attack.NodeContext: Addressed to the dragon. cue-DAY-nos.

VossDecision_OM_Laezel_COM_53.context: CinematicNodeContext: Fahra lunges towards Voss and attacks. Wounded, he falls to the ground.

VossDecision_OM_Laezel_COM_83.speaker: Lae'zel
VossDecision_OM_Laezel_COM_83.context: NodeContext: Lae'zel calling out after Farah strikes Voss down

VossDecision_OM_Laezel_COM_152.speaker: a4df3a1d-0c32-4548-acfe-5e45b1886671
VossDecision_OM_Laezel_COM_152.context: CinematicNodeContext: Fahra weaves a psionic spell and casts it on Voss's dragon, making it fight for her.NodeContext: cue-DAY-nos CHEER-key. Che-MAR ZAL-la VLAH-kith!

VossDecision_OM_Laezel_COM_58.context: CinematicNodeContext: The dragon rears up and roars at the party.

VossDecision_OM_Laezel_COM_68.speaker: a4df3a1d-0c32-4548-acfe-5e45b1886671
VossDecision_OM_Laezel_COM_68.context: CinematicNodeContext: Prepares to attack.NodeContext: Addressed to the dragon. cue-DAY-nos.

VossDecision_OM_Laezel_COM_144.speaker: a4df3a1d-0c32-4548-acfe-5e45b1886671
VossDecision_OM_Laezel_COM_144.text: So it is written! To arms, Lae'zel. Let the traitors taste blood and silver!

VossDecision_OM_Laezel_COM_37.speaker: Player
VossDecision_OM_Laezel_COM_37.text: Gith's spirit lives on in her son. He deserves your allegiance.

VossDecision_OM_Laezel_COM_99.speaker: Lae'zel
VossDecision_OM_Laezel_COM_99.text: My eyes were open, and I refused to see. My ears heard, and still I turned away. But I will be slave no more.

VossDecision_OM_Laezel_COM_128.speaker: Lae'zel
VossDecision_OM_Laezel_COM_128.text: I know my allegiance. It is to my Queen!

VossDecision_OM_Laezel_COM_73.speaker: Player
VossDecision_OM_Laezel_COM_73.text: Very well. Remain loyal to Vlaakith, and bear the consequences.

VossDecision_OM_Laezel_COM_113.speaker: Lae'zel
VossDecision_OM_Laezel_COM_113.text: Vlaakith is my path. Ascension is my fate!

VossDecision_OM_Laezel_COM_107.speaker: Lae'zel
VossDecision_OM_Laezel_COM_107.text: You. I lend you my might, my very essence, and you thwart my will at every turn!

VossDecision_OM_Laezel_COM_62.speaker: Lae'zel
VossDecision_OM_Laezel_COM_62.text: My queen calls. I am prepared to answer.

VossDecision_OM_Laezel_COM_85.speaker: Lae'zel
VossDecision_OM_Laezel_COM_85.text: My eyes were open, and I refused to see. My ears heard, and still I turned away. But I will be slave no more.
VossDecision_OM_Laezel_COM_85.context: NodeContext: Addressed to player. Increasingly intense.

VossDecision_OM_Laezel_COM_105.speaker: Player
VossDecision_OM_Laezel_COM_105.text: You are a servant of Vlaakith. Killing Voss is the only way forward.

VossDecision_OM_Laezel_COM_137.speaker: Lae'zel
VossDecision_OM_Laezel_COM_137.text: Pitiful kith'rak. Your lies sting like acid and burn like flame. I name you hshar'lak - traitor!

VossDecision_OM_Laezel_COM_52.speaker: Lae'zel
VossDecision_OM_Laezel_COM_52.text: Have you already forgotten? Did my own Queen not turn her back?

VossDecision_OM_Laezel_COM_103.speaker: Player
VossDecision_OM_Laezel_COM_103.text: The Absolute's army marches. We need Vlaakith on our side.

VossDecision_OM_Laezel_COM_102.speaker: Lae'zel
VossDecision_OM_Laezel_COM_102.text: Yes. Yes! 'Beware the lies of false prophets.' So said the exalted Queen. And so I will heed!

VossDecision_OM_Laezel_COM_47.speaker: Kith'rak Voss
VossDecision_OM_Laezel_COM_47.text: Lae'zel. You will not be our ruin. Orpheus will rise. The githyanki will be free.
VossDecision_OM_Laezel_COM_47.context: NodeContext: Addressed to Lae'zel. Sad but determined.

VossDecision_OM_Laezel_COM_21.speaker: Kith'rak Voss
VossDecision_OM_Laezel_COM_21.context: CinematicNodeContext: Preparing to fight.NodeContext: Called out to the dragon, preparing to fight.

VossDecision_OM_Laezel_COM_97.speaker: Lae'zel
VossDecision_OM_Laezel_COM_97.text: No. I will be slave no longer!

VossDecision_OM_Laezel_COM_7.speaker: Lae'zel
VossDecision_OM_Laezel_COM_7.text: 'Live, but only if you live free' - Gith's plea to us all. I will know my prince. This is my path.

VossDecision_OM_Laezel_COM_70.speaker: a4df3a1d-0c32-4548-acfe-5e45b1886671
VossDecision_OM_Laezel_COM_70.text: K'chakhi! I name you hshar'lak - traitor to your people. It is written!
VossDecision_OM_Laezel_COM_70.context: CinematicNodeContext: Preparing to fightNodeContext: ke-CHOCK-ee / h-SHAR-lack (Idiot/Traitor) Addressed to Lae'zel

VossDecision_OM_Laezel_COM_9.speaker: Player
VossDecision_OM_Laezel_COM_9.text: Gith made your people free. But it was Vlaakith who made them mighty.

VossDecision_OM_Laezel_COM_10.speaker: Lae'zel
VossDecision_OM_Laezel_COM_10.text: Yes. Yes! I will be pure. I will ascend. I will wield silver!

VossDecision_OM_Laezel_COM_30.speaker: Player
VossDecision_OM_Laezel_COM_30.text: Fool! Reject Orpheus, or I will present your head to Vlaakith myself.

VossDecision_OM_Laezel_COM_131.speaker: Lae'zel
VossDecision_OM_Laezel_COM_131.text: I see it - your great will, your great strength, a gift from Vlaakith herself.

VossDecision_OM_Laezel_COM_42.speaker: Lae'zel
VossDecision_OM_Laezel_COM_42.text: I am Gith's child. I bend to Vlaakith no longer.

VossDecision_OM_Laezel_COM_101.speaker: Player
VossDecision_OM_Laezel_COM_101.text: Renounce Vlaakith if you must, then. But be prepared for the consequences.

VossDecision_OM_Laezel_COM_93.speaker: Lae'zel
VossDecision_OM_Laezel_COM_93.text: Then I turn to the True Heir.

VossDecision_OM_Laezel_COM_8.speaker: Player
VossDecision_OM_Laezel_COM_8.text: Do as you will, Lae'zel. I won't stand in your way.

VossDecision_OM_Laezel_COM_110.speaker: Narrator
VossDecision_OM_Laezel_COM_110.text: *Lae'zel's loyalty wavers. You feel her confusion, her uncertainty - and a nascent longing for freedom.*
VossDecision_OM_Laezel_COM_110.context: CinematicNodeContext: Mind meld between Lae'zel and player, but no need to show anyone's hands go to their heads, just the VFX is fine.

VossDecision_OM_Laezel_COM_119.speaker: a4df3a1d-0c32-4548-acfe-5e45b1886671
VossDecision_OM_Laezel_COM_119.text: I know you. Your Queen knows you. A nova among stars.

VossDecision_OM_Laezel_COM_127.speaker: Player
VossDecision_OM_Laezel_COM_127.text: That doesn't explain why you came for our heads.

VossDecision_OM_Laezel_COM_75.speaker: Kith'rak Voss
VossDecision_OM_Laezel_COM_75.text: I knew not then what I know now. Let the truth be my atonement.

VossDecision_OM_Laezel_COM_104.speaker: Player
VossDecision_OM_Laezel_COM_104.text: I thought the artefact was a weapon.

VossDecision_OM_Laezel_COM_76.speaker: Kith'rak Voss
VossDecision_OM_Laezel_COM_76.text: And so it is. It holds the true heir, it holds insurrection - a blade to be held against Vlaakith's withered throat.

VossDecision_OM_Laezel_COM_4.speaker: Player
VossDecision_OM_Laezel_COM_4.text: Tell me more of this Orpheus.

VossDecision_OM_Laezel_COM_50.speaker: Kith'rak Voss
VossDecision_OM_Laezel_COM_50.text: Son of Gith, our great mother. Vlaakith calls him traitor. I call him saviour.

VossDecision_OM_Laezel_COM_90.speaker: Player
VossDecision_OM_Laezel_COM_90.text: Orpheus - Gith's son. I thought he was long dead.

VossDecision_OM_Laezel_COM_25.speaker: Kith'rak Voss
VossDecision_OM_Laezel_COM_25.text: A myth, recorded to slate, fed to us like devils to dragons.

VlaakithsHandAfterCombat_OM_Laezel_AOM_O.speaker: a4df3a1d-0c32-4548-acfe-5e45b1886671
VlaakithsHandAfterCombat_OM_Laezel_AOM_O.text: |How lovely! You did a great job disposing of this traitor.|

VlaakithsHandAfterCombat_OM_Laezel_AOM_O.speaker: Lae'zel
VlaakithsHandAfterCombat_OM_Laezel_AOM_O.text: |It was an honor serving my Queen.|

VlaakithsHandAfterCombat_OM_Laezel_AOM_O.speaker: a4df3a1d-0c32-4548-acfe-5e45b1886671
VlaakithsHandAfterCombat_OM_Laezel_AOM_O.text: |How unfortunate that your companion had to suffer through this.|

VlaakithsHandAfterCombat_OM_Laezel_AOM_O.speaker: Lae'zel
VlaakithsHandAfterCombat_OM_Laezel_AOM_O.text: |I have tried! I went to the Creche!

VlaakithsHandAfterCombat_OM_Laezel_AOM_O.speaker: Lae'zel
VlaakithsHandAfterCombat_OM_Laezel_AOM_O.text: |I couldn't do it. It's the only thing protecting me now.|

VlaakithsHandAfterCombat_OM_Laezel_AOM_O.speaker: a4df3a1d-0c32-4548-acfe-5e45b1886671
VlaakithsHandAfterCombat_OM_Laezel_AOM_O.text: |Now, hand it over.|

VlaakithsHandAfterCombat_OM_Laezel_AOM_O.speaker: a4df3a1d-0c32-4548-acfe-5e45b1886671
VlaakithsHandAfterCombat_OM_Laezel_AOM_O.text: |Listen, Orpheus can help against the illithi-|

VlaakithsHandAfterCombat_OM_Laezel_AOM_O.speaker: a4df3a1d-0c32-4548-acfe-5e45b1886671
VlaakithsHandAfterCombat_OM_Laezel_AOM_O.text: |I've heard enough. Guards - take the artefact and kill her.|

VlaakithsHandAfterCombat_OM_Laezel_AOM_O.speaker: a4df3a1d-0c32-4548-acfe-5e45b1886671
VlaakithsHandAfterCombat_OM_Laezel_AOM_O.text: |How lovely! You did a great job disposing of this traitor.|

VlaakithsHandAfterCombat_OM_Laezel_AOM_O.speaker: a4df3a1d-0c32-4548-acfe-5e45b1886671
VlaakithsHandAfterCombat_OM_Laezel_AOM_O.text: |Now, we have time to talk. Tell me, why have you been avoiding your duties?|

VlaakithsHandAfterCombat_OM_Laezel_AOM_O.speaker: a4df3a1d-0c32-4548-acfe-5e45b1886671
VlaakithsHandAfterCombat_OM_Laezel_AOM_O.text: |You have what Vlaakith is seeking.|

VlaakithsHandAfterCombat_OM_Laezel_AOM_O.speaker: a4df3a1d-0c32-4548-acfe-5e45b1886671
VlaakithsHandAfterCombat_OM_Laezel_AOM_O.text: |Yet, the one inside is still alive. Why haven't you acted on it yet?|

VlaakithsHandAfterCombat_OM_Laezel_AOM_O.speaker: Lae'zel
VlaakithsHandAfterCombat_OM_Laezel_AOM_O.text: |I wish I could, but it's the only thing protecting me.|

VlaakithsHandAfterCombat_OM_Laezel_AOM_O.speaker: a4df3a1d-0c32-4548-acfe-5e45b1886671
VlaakithsHandAfterCombat_OM_Laezel_AOM_O.text: |You should know that your life is insignifacnt. Dying for your Queen is an honor!|

VlaakithsHandAfterCombat_OM_Laezel_AOM_O.speaker: a4df3a1d-0c32-4548-acfe-5e45b1886671
VlaakithsHandAfterCombat_OM_Laezel_AOM_O.text: |Now. Hand over the artefact.|

VlaakithsHandAfterCombat_OM_Laezel_AOM_O.speaker: Lae'zel
VlaakithsHandAfterCombat_OM_Laezel_AOM_O.text: |Using Orpheus's power to our advantage is our best chance against the illithids.|
True

VlaakithsHandAfterCombat_OM_Laezel_AOM_O.speaker: a4df3a1d-0c32-4548-acfe-5e45b1886671
VlaakithsHandAfterCombat_OM_Laezel_AOM_O.text: |Interesting take. Alright.|

VlaakithsHandAfterCombat_OM_Laezel_AOM_O.speaker: a4df3a1d-0c32-4548-acfe-5e45b1886671
VlaakithsHandAfterCombat_OM_Laezel_AOM_O.text: |I am quite interested in seeing what you can do with it.|

VlaakithsHandAfterCombat_OM_Laezel_AOM_O.speaker: a4df3a1d-0c32-4548-acfe-5e45b1886671
VlaakithsHandAfterCombat_OM_Laezel_AOM_O.text: |I will let you keep it for now, but will keep a close watch over your actions.|

VlaakithsHandAfterCombat_OM_Laezel_AOM_O.speaker: a4df3a1d-0c32-4548-acfe-5e45b1886671
VlaakithsHandAfterCombat_OM_Laezel_AOM_O.text: |Farewell.|
False

VlaakithsHandAfterCombat_OM_Laezel_AOM_O.speaker: a4df3a1d-0c32-4548-acfe-5e45b1886671
VlaakithsHandAfterCombat_OM_Laezel_AOM_O.text: |That is foolish. We can deal with both threats at once.|

VlaakithsHandAfterCombat_OM_Laezel_AOM_O.speaker: a4df3a1d-0c32-4548-acfe-5e45b1886671
VlaakithsHandAfterCombat_OM_Laezel_AOM_O.text: |Do you doubt your Queen?|

VlaakithsHandAfterCombat_OM_Laezel_AOM_O.speaker: a4df3a1d-0c32-4548-acfe-5e45b1886671
VlaakithsHandAfterCombat_OM_Laezel_AOM_O.text: |For this, you will pay with your life. And the artefact.|

VlaakithsHandAfterCombat_OM_Laezel_AOM_O.speaker: a4df3a1d-0c32-4548-acfe-5e45b1886671
VlaakithsHandAfterCombat_OM_Laezel_AOM_O.text: |Kill them!|

VlaakithsHandAfterCombat_OM_Laezel_AOM_O.speaker: Lae'zel
VlaakithsHandAfterCombat_OM_Laezel_AOM_O.text: |I will not hand over the artefact.|

VlaakithsHandAfterCombat_OM_Laezel_AOM_O.speaker: a4df3a1d-0c32-4548-acfe-5e45b1886671
VlaakithsHandAfterCombat_OM_Laezel_AOM_O.text: |How amusing. Just after you fought a dragon, you think you can stop me from taking it?|

VossDecision_OM_Laezel_AOM_32.speaker: Kith'rak Voss
VossDecision_OM_Laezel_AOM_32.text: |I apologize for causing damage to your camp. I made sure no one is harmed.|

VossDecision_OM_Laezel_AOM_18.speaker: Kith'rak Voss
VossDecision_OM_Laezel_AOM_18.text: |I need the artefact that you carry. The whole fate of the our race depends on it.|

VossDecision_OM_Laezel_AOM_3.speaker: Player
VossDecision_OM_Laezel_AOM_3.text: [DID CRECHE]  |I visited the Creche nearby. You're following Vlaakith's orders too.|

VossDecision_OM_Laezel_AOM_0.speaker: Kith'rak Voss
VossDecision_OM_Laezel_AOM_0.text: |Vlaakith.. You couldn't be farther from the truth.|

VossDecision_OM_Laezel_AOM_30.speaker: Kith'rak Voss
VossDecision_OM_Laezel_AOM_30.text: |I am the one who fought with our Prince, and the one who failed and doomed us to tyranny.|

VossDecision_OM_Laezel_AOM_39.speaker: Kith'rak Voss
VossDecision_OM_Laezel_AOM_39.text: |If there is a small part of you that wonders who you would be without the Queen and her foul codes, if you have ever dreamt of Prince Orpheus, we can bring him to life.|

VossDecision_OM_Laezel_AOM_22.speaker: Kith'rak Voss
VossDecision_OM_Laezel_AOM_22.text: |We escaped slavery before, but we still think like slaves.|

VossDecision_OM_Laezel_AOM_33.speaker: Kith'rak Voss
VossDecision_OM_Laezel_AOM_33.text: |What you have is the solution that will free us. It imprisons the Prince in the shooting star: Orpheus. We are a revolution.|

VossDecision_OM_Laezel_AOM_7.speaker: Player
VossDecision_OM_Laezel_AOM_7.text: [DID ASTRAL PRISON] |Orpheus? It's Daisy the one in there, you're mistaken.|

VossDecision_OM_Laezel_AOM_28.speaker: Player
VossDecision_OM_Laezel_AOM_28.text: |Who is Orpheus, what the hell are you going on about?|

VossDecision_OM_Laezel_AOM_2.speaker: Player
VossDecision_OM_Laezel_AOM_2.text: |I want to help you, but I cannot give away this artefact easily.|

VossDecision_OM_Laezel_AOM_37.speaker: Narrator
VossDecision_OM_Laezel_AOM_37.text: |*You suddenly feel weak and your head stings with sharp pain... As the moment passes, you start feeling normal again.*|

VossDecision_OM_Laezel_AOM_19.speaker: Kith'rak Voss
VossDecision_OM_Laezel_AOM_19.text: |What was that? What are you not telling me?|

VossDecision_OM_Laezel_AOM_31.speaker: Narrator
VossDecision_OM_Laezel_AOM_31.text: |*Suddenly a portal opens and a few Githyanki exit out of it and move to surround the party.*|

VossDecision_OM_Laezel_AOM_12.speaker: a4df3a1d-0c32-4548-acfe-5e45b1886671
VossDecision_OM_Laezel_AOM_12.text: |Not a step further. Hand over the artefact.|

VossDecision_OM_Laezel_AOM_34.speaker: a4df3a1d-0c32-4548-acfe-5e45b1886671
VossDecision_OM_Laezel_AOM_34.text: |You're the one who killed W'Wargaz. Such treachery also hides strength.|

VossDecision_OM_Laezel_AOM_23.speaker: a4df3a1d-0c32-4548-acfe-5e45b1886671
VossDecision_OM_Laezel_AOM_23.text: |Vlaakith is willing to give you another chance.|

VossDecision_OM_Laezel_AOM_25.speaker: a4df3a1d-0c32-4548-acfe-5e45b1886671
VossDecision_OM_Laezel_AOM_25.text: |I recall your name, Lae'zel. An outstanding pupil, pride of the crèche K'liir. You're a true follower of Gith.|

VossDecision_OM_Laezel_AOM_5.speaker: a4df3a1d-0c32-4548-acfe-5e45b1886671
VossDecision_OM_Laezel_AOM_5.text: |Don't be swayed by this traitor. Thanks to Gith himself, our people are the world's conquerors.|

VossDecision_OM_Laezel_AOM_10.speaker: a4df3a1d-0c32-4548-acfe-5e45b1886671
VossDecision_OM_Laezel_AOM_10.text: |Serving Vlaakith is an honor and duty.|

VossDecision_OM_Laezel_AOM_26.speaker: a4df3a1d-0c32-4548-acfe-5e45b1886671
VossDecision_OM_Laezel_AOM_26.text: |Your time has ended, Voss. You've been under our watch for long, and your treachery ends now.|

VossDecision_OM_Laezel_AOM_21.speaker: a4df3a1d-0c32-4548-acfe-5e45b1886671
VossDecision_OM_Laezel_AOM_21.text: |Lae'zel. Kill the traitor. Your Queen is watching you closely.|

VossDecision_OM_Laezel_AOM_8.speaker: Kith'rak Voss
VossDecision_OM_Laezel_AOM_8.text: |Don't listen to her! Orpheus is the only way forward!|

VossDecision_OM_Laezel_AOM_16.speaker: Narrator
VossDecision_OM_Laezel_AOM_16.text: |*Serving your Queen... or helping free Orpheus.*|

VossDecision_OM_Laezel_AOM_20.speaker: Narrator
VossDecision_OM_Laezel_AOM_20.text: |*You can't help but think this decision might shape up the future of your people.*|

VossDecision_OM_Laezel_AOM_11.speaker: a4df3a1d-0c32-4548-acfe-5e45b1886671
VossDecision_OM_Laezel_AOM_11.text: |You will die now. *Casts a spell on the dragon*. Kill them, Dragon!|

VossDecision_OM_Laezel_AOM_15.speaker: a4df3a1d-0c32-4548-acfe-5e45b1886671
VossDecision_OM_Laezel_AOM_15.text: |Very good. Follow your orders and kill the traitor. I will enjoy the spectacle.|

VossDecision_OM_Laezel_AOM_6.speaker: Kith'rak Voss
VossDecision_OM_Laezel_AOM_6.text: |You are making a grave mistake. Vlaakith will bring our people to ruin!|

VossDecision_OM_Laezel_AOM_29.speaker: a4df3a1d-0c32-4548-acfe-5e45b1886671
VossDecision_OM_Laezel_AOM_29.text: |Vlaakith's inquisitors have been keeping track of you.|

VossDecision_OM_Laezel_AOM_13.speaker: Player
VossDecision_OM_Laezel_AOM_13.text: |A githyanki revolution? That has nothing to do with me, please leave.|

VossDecision_OM_Laezel_AOM_24.speaker: Player
VossDecision_OM_Laezel_AOM_24.text: [ALREADY MET VOSS] |We already met once, Kithrak Voss. We've been over this already.|

VossDecision_OM_Laezel_AOM_9.speaker: Kith'rak Voss
VossDecision_OM_Laezel_AOM_9.text: |I think we didn't start off with the right foot. Let me introduce myself.|

VossDecision_OM_Laezel_AOM_4.speaker: Player
VossDecision_OM_Laezel_AOM_4.text: |Why is everyone so desperate for this artefact?|

VossDecision_OM_Laezel_AOM_40.speaker: Kith'rak Voss
VossDecision_OM_Laezel_AOM_40.text: |It imprisons the one who'll save us from Vlaakith.|

VlaakithsHandAfterCombat_OM_Laezel_COM_1.speaker: a4df3a1d-0c32-4548-acfe-5e45b1886671
VlaakithsHandAfterCombat_OM_Laezel_COM_1.text: |How lovely! You did a great job disposing of this traitor.|

VlaakithsHandAfterCombat_OM_Laezel_COM_1.speaker: a4df3a1d-0c32-4548-acfe-5e45b1886671
VlaakithsHandAfterCombat_OM_Laezel_COM_1.text: |Now, we have time to talk. Tell me, why have you been avoiding your duties?|

VlaakithsHandAfterCombat_OM_Laezel_COM_2.speaker: Lae'zel
VlaakithsHandAfterCombat_OM_Laezel_COM_2.text: |I have tried! I went to the Creche!

VlaakithsHandAfterCombat_OM_Laezel_COM_1.speaker: a4df3a1d-0c32-4548-acfe-5e45b1886671
VlaakithsHandAfterCombat_OM_Laezel_COM_1.text: |Yet, the one inside is still alive. It's about time you fullfill your mission. Hand it over.|

VlaakithsHandAfterCombat_OM_Laezel_COM_4.speaker: Lae'zel
VlaakithsHandAfterCombat_OM_Laezel_COM_4.text: |I need it to fulfill my mission. Without it I cannot serve my Queen.|

VlaakithsHandAfterCombat_OM_Laezel_COM_1.speaker: a4df3a1d-0c32-4548-acfe-5e45b1886671
VlaakithsHandAfterCombat_OM_Laezel_COM_1.text: |Pathetic. *Turns to the avatar.* You seem to have more common sense. The artefact. Now.|

VlaakithsHandAfterCombat_OM_Laezel_COM_0.speaker: Player
VlaakithsHandAfterCombat_OM_Laezel_COM_0.text: |I wish I could, but it's the only thing protecting me.|

VlaakithsHandAfterCombat_OM_Laezel_COM_6.speaker: a4df3a1d-0c32-4548-acfe-5e45b1886671
VlaakithsHandAfterCombat_OM_Laezel_COM_6.text: |What is one life compared to the greatness of your Queen?|

VlaakithsHandAfterCombat_OM_Laezel_COM_3.speaker: a4df3a1d-0c32-4548-acfe-5e45b1886671
VlaakithsHandAfterCombat_OM_Laezel_COM_3.text: |You are wasting your breath. Give it, or perish.|

VlaakithsHandAfterCombat_OM_Laezel_COM_7.speaker: a4df3a1d-0c32-4548-acfe-5e45b1886671
VlaakithsHandAfterCombat_OM_Laezel_COM_7.text: |A single istik's life pales in comparison to the importance of Vlaakith's orders.|

VlaakithsHandAfterCombat_OM_Laezel_COM_1.speaker: Player
VlaakithsHandAfterCombat_OM_Laezel_COM_1.text: |Using Orpheus's power to our advantage is our best chance against the illithids.|

VlaakithsHandAfterCombat_OM_Laezel_COM_2.speaker: a4df3a1d-0c32-4548-acfe-5e45b1886671
VlaakithsHandAfterCombat_OM_Laezel_COM_2.text: |I am quite interested in seeing what you can do with it.|

VlaakithsHandAfterCombat_OM_Laezel_COM_1.speaker: a4df3a1d-0c32-4548-acfe-5e45b1886671
VlaakithsHandAfterCombat_OM_Laezel_COM_1.text: |I will let you keep it for now, but will keep a close watch over your actions.|

VlaakithsHandAfterCombat_OM_Laezel_COM_2.speaker: a4df3a1d-0c32-4548-acfe-5e45b1886671
VlaakithsHandAfterCombat_OM_Laezel_COM_2.text: |That is foolish. We can deal with both threats at once.|

VlaakithsHandAfterCombat_OM_Laezel_COM_2.speaker: a4df3a1d-0c32-4548-acfe-5e45b1886671
VlaakithsHandAfterCombat_OM_Laezel_COM_2.text: |I don't have time for this, you will pay with your life. And the artefact.|

VlaakithsHandAfterCombat_OM_Laezel_COM_9.speaker: Player
VlaakithsHandAfterCombat_OM_Laezel_COM_9.text: |I will not hand over the artefact.|

VlaakithsHandAfterCombat_OM_Laezel_COM_8.speaker: a4df3a1d-0c32-4548-acfe-5e45b1886671
VlaakithsHandAfterCombat_OM_Laezel_COM_8.text: |How amusing. Just after you fought a dragon, you think you can stop me from taking it?|
